lyrics.zht: 他們說你的心 似乎痊癒了
lyrics.zhp: tā men shuō nǐ de xīn sì hū quán yù le
lyrics.eng: They said that your heart seems to be healed

lyrics.zht: 也開始有個人 為你守護著
lyrics.zhp: yě kāi shǐ yǒu gè rén wèi nǐ shǒu hù zhe
lyrics.eng: I also started to have someone guarding you
